title: FocusManager
subtitle: The singleton that orchestrates the entire focus system.
plainText: At the very top of the focus tree sits the `FocusManager`, a global singleton that acts as the ultimate authority on focus for your entire application.
You can access it from anywhere in your code via `FocusManager.instance`.
Its most important property is `primaryFocus`, which always points to the single `FocusNode` that is currently receiving keyboard events.
The `FocusManager` also processes default traversal keys (like Tab) that are not handled lower down in the tree.
